A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi was extremely boring\, tedious and drawn out. Almost painfully so. It had some cool moments\, and some good things about it...but it's just glacial in pace\, and the villains aren't interesting enough to sustain it.
Star Wars is SUPPOSED TO BE FUN. This movie is NOT fun...it reminded me of the battle star galactica reboot\, and I do not mean that as a compliment.
Too much Kurasawa/Ford\, not enough Flash Gordon/Erol Flynn.
Oh\, and Vader is totally Luke's dad.
